column2: "Na Boaz sii mu kɔr kuropon no ano
column5: obusuanyi a ɔbɛn no a Boaz kaa no ho asɛm no botwaa mu; na ɔfrɛɛ no dɛ

column2: "Na ɔfaa kurow no mu mpanyimfo mu mbanyin du
column4: Hom ntsena famu ha. Na wɔtsenae."

column2: "Na ɔsee obusuanyi a ɔbɛn no dɛ
column3: Naomi a ofi Moabman mu asan aba no
column4: ɔrotɔn asaasetɔw no a ɔyɛ hɛn nua Elimelek dze no:"

column2: "na modween dɛ mebɛda no edzi akyerɛ wo
column4: Tɔ no wɔ hɔn a wɔtsetse ha yi enyim
column5: na me man mpanyimfo yi enyim. Sɛ ebɔpon a
column6: pon: na sɛ ennkɔpon so a
column8: ma munhu: osiandɛ obiara nnyi hɔ a ɔpon ka wo ho; na emi na midzi w'ekyir. Na ɔsee dɛ

column2: "Nna Boaz see dɛ
column3: Da biara a ebɔtɔ Naomi nsamu haban no
column4: nna ewɔ dɛ etɔ no wɔ Moabnyi Rut a ɔyɛ owufo yer no so hɔ
column5: na ama owufo no ne dzin do wɔ n'egyapadze do."

column2: "Na obusuanyi a ɔbɛn no see dɛ
column4: ɔno bɛyɛ na masɛɛ mankasa m'egyapadze: ɔwoara fa mo pon ho eyiedzi no fa

column2: "Afei iyi nye atɔrmuadze a nkan no ɔwɔ Israel wɔ ɔpon ho na nsesa ho
column3: ma wɔdze hyɛ ndzɛmba nyinara dzen; nyimpa yi ne mpaboa
column4: na ɔdze ma ne nyɛnko: nna iyi nye mbrɛ wosi hyɛ dase wɔ Israel mu."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi obusuanyi a ɔbɛn no see Boaz dɛ
column3: Woara tɔ fa. Na oyii ne mpaboa."

column2: "Na Boaz see mpanyimfo no
column4: Ndɛ da yi hom yɛ adasefo dɛ matɔ dza ɔyɛ Elimelek dze nyinara
column5: na dza ɔyɛ Kilion na Malon dze nyinara wɔ Naomi nsamu."

column2: "Nkyii so magye Moabnyi Rut
column5: ama maama owufo no ne dzin do wɔ n'egyapadze do
column6: amma woeenntwa owufo no ne dzin emmfi no nuanom mu
column7: na no kuropon ano: hom yɛ adasefo ndɛ da yi."

column2: "Na ɔman no a wɔwɔ kuropon ano no nyinara
column4: Yɛyɛ adasefo. EWURADZE nyɛ ɔbaa no a ɔaba wo fie no dɛ Rakel na Leah a hɔn beenu no kyekyeer Israel fi no: na yɛ okunyin wɔ Efrata

column2: "na w'asefo a EWURADZE dze fi akataasia yi mu bɛma wo no mma wo fi nyɛ dɛ Perez a Tamar woo no maa Juda no ne fi."
"Nna Boaz faa Rut ma ɔbɛyɛɛ ne yer; na ɔkɔr ne nkyɛn
"Na sɔn no mu mbasiafo no see Naomi dɛ
column3: Nhyira nka EWURADZE a ɔamma obusuanyi a ɔbɛn ammbɔ wo ndɛ da yi
column4: na wɔmma ɔngye dzin wɔ Israel mu."

column2: "Na ɔbɛyɛ nkwamafo ama wo
column3: na wo mpanyinyɛber mu ɔhwɛfo: osiandɛ w'asew a ɔdɔ wo a oye ma wo ma ɔsen mbabanyin beesuon

column2: "Na Naomi faa abofra no
column3: na ɔdze no too no bo mu

column2: "Na mbasiafo a wɔnye no tse fie no maa no dzin dɛ
column3: Wɔawo babanyin ama Naomi; na wɔfrɛɛ no Obed: ɔno nye David n'egya Jesse so n'egya."

column2: "Afei iyinom nye Perez ne mbasantsen: Perez woo Hezron;"
"na Hezron woo Ram
"na Amminadab woo Nahson
"na Salmon woo Boaz
"na Obed woo Jesse na Jesse woo David."
